tasks.text:
If you are at a scenic spot and you see a lot of people using a certain cell phone A to take pictures of the scenery, which of these options is more likely?
A) Phone A is a popular cell phone.
B) Phone A is a popular cell phone with good cameras.
answers:
B) Phone A is a popular cell phone with good cameras. 

This option is more likely because people are more likely to use a phone with a good camera to take pictures of a scenic spot. 
## B) Phone A is a popular cell phone with good cameras. 

This option is more likely because people are specifically using Phone A to take pictures of the scenery, suggesting that it has good camera capabilities.
